tool_description: This endpoint offers a flexible and dynamic way to generate randomized personal profiles, perfect for developers and testers in need of quality mock data. This endpoint stands out for its support of multiple data formats, including JSON, XML, CSV, and more, ensuring seamless integration with different systems and technologies. Additionally, users can tailor the output to their specific needs by leveraging a wide range of custom options, such as setting the number of profiles, filtering by spe...
name: RandomPersonGenerator
title: RandomPersonGenerator

api_list.name: Get Random People
api_list.description: Get a randomly generated person list in JSON, XML, CSV, SQL, or many other formats. The data can also be customized with sorting, paging, filtering, column aliasing, column selection, and much more. For a detailed overview of all supported formats and customization possibilities, please refer to our comprehensive documentation.

required_parameters.name: format
required_parameters.description: Supported values: json, jsonp, xml, csv, sql, table, array
